channel.title: Ipod on Konigi
channel.description: Recent content in Ipod on Konigi

item.title: iStik Designers Make a Better iPod Holder
item.description: Core77 talks about a couple that makes good with self-designed iPod accessory, the iStik. Great example of designers finding buyers in a market saturated with accessory makers. They stand out because they’ve thought of the problem, researched how to make the better mousetrap and deliver a product that sells the story of sticking your nano wherever you want when you work out. They’ve made $50K in 6 months. Excellent stuff.
